text: Ricky Fataar (born 5 September 1952) is a South African drummer, guitarist, actor and singer. An actor, he was known for his role in The Rutles: All You Need Is Cash. For a short time, he worked for The Beach Boys between 1971 and 1974. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:South African actors Category:Blues musicians Category:Pop musicians Category:Rock guitarists Category:Drummers Category:Rock singers Category:Pop singers Category:South African guitarists Category:South African singers
title: Ricky Fataar
